item.title: Portfolio
item.description: Hostly A dot net core stlye host for Xamarin apps Sound it out Online portal to generate audio books from documents Clipboard A c# library that provides the ability to extract text from various document file formats SSLEngine A c# library that provides the ability to execute OpenSSL commands

item.title: Free hosting with GitHub pages
item.description: With the use of GitHub pages and Cloudflare, it is very possible to host your own static website over HTTPS for free. However, there are a few pre-requisites: A GitHub account (register here) A CloudFlare account (register here) An installation of Hugo (Optional) Once you have signed up to both of the services the first thing to do is create yourself a new GitHub repository Setting up GitHub Pages Step 1 - Create a new repository First, we need to create a new GitHub repository, use a name with the following naming convention: <your username/organisation>.

item.title: Career
item.description: Software consultant Atlas Computer Systems Ltd After working in a graduate developer position for a short while i was then promomoted to software consultant for a more client facing position. 2020-03-01 Graduate software developer Atlas Computer Systems Ltd After successfully securing a First Class (Hons.) Bsc Computer Science degree I was promoted to a graduate developer. 2019-09-01 Degree apprentice University of essex Whilst in my role as a junior developer I was given the opportunity to enter a degree apprenticeship program.
